channel.title: Server start problem
channel.description: For some reason everytime i run any PI server it really doesnt start even on localhost ... like if i start the server NVIDIA and try to connect with its client it doesnt connect and if i open the runserver.bat 2-3 times it doesnt say port in use or w.e like it shud

item.title: Server start problem
item.dc:creator: @triger545 triger545
item.description:
@triger545 wrote:

If it opens then closes then you gotta select your version of jdk. Go to my computer. Click your C:\ drive. Program Files (x86) (if available) then click Java then read your version of jdk. Edit your runserver and change the last numbers after java. If this doesn’t work PM me.

Read full topic
